panels.description: This panel shows the rate in which UDP tests are being performed
panels.title: UDP Test Rate

panels.description: This panel shows the rate in which TCP tests are being performed
panels.title: TCP Test Rate

panels.description: This panel shows the rate in which DNS tests are being performed
panels.title: DNS Test Rate

panels.description: Each UDP test sends 10 UDP packets every 5 seconds to a remote host, and that remote host replies with another packet.  This graph plots the average round-trip duration.
panels.title: Average Inter Zone RTT

panels.description: Each UDP test sends 10 UDP packets every 5 seconds to a remote host, and that remote host replies with another packet.  This graph plots the variance between the faster and the slowest response.
panels.title: Average Inter Zone RTT Variance

panels.description: Each UDP test sends 10 UDP packets every 5 seconds to a remote host, and that remote host replies with another packet.  We wait a maximum of 250ms for a response packet, before considering it lost.
panels.title: Average Loss by Source Zone

panels.description: Each UDP test sends 10 UDP packets every 5 seconds to a remote host, and that remote host replies with another packet.  We wait a maximum of 250ms for a response packet, before considering it lost.
panels.title: Average Loss by Destination Zone

panels.description: Each UDP test sends 10 UDP packets every 5 seconds to a remote host, and that remote host replies with another packet.  We wait a maximum of 250ms for a response packet, before considering it lost.
panels.title: Average Loss by Source Node

panels.description: Each UDP test sends 10 UDP packets every 5 seconds to a remote host, and that remote host replies with another packet.  We wait a maximum of 250ms for a response packet, before considering it lost.
panels.title: Average Loss by Destination Node

panels.description: Shows DNS Tests by their destination
panels.title: Successful Tests by Destination Host

panels.description: Shows DNS Tests by their destination
panels.title: Failing Tests by Destination Host

panels.description: This shows DNS test failures by source zone
panels.title: Failures by Source Zone

panels.description: This shows DNS test failures by source node
panels.title: Failures by Source Node

panels.description: This panel shows the average time it takes to perform a full TCP handshake and establish a connection
panels.title: Average Inter Zone Connect Duration

panels.description: This panel shows the average total TCP request duration, measured from the point the socket has been allocated on the local host, to the socket being closed following a response from the destination.
panels.title: Average Inter Zone RTT

panels.description: This test shows failures grouped by their source zone
panels.title: Failures by Source Zone

panels.description: This test shows failures grouped by their source zone
panels.title: Failures by Destination Zone

panels.description: This test shows failures grouped by their source node
panels.title: Failures by Source Node

panels.description: This test shows failures grouped by their destination node
panels.title: Failures by Destination Node
